forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze and a chance of rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 74. Northeast wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Haze before 8pm. Mostly clear. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. North northeast wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 76, with temperatures falling to around 74 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 54. North northeast wind 2 to 9 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
